description: This file defines a React functional component named ErrorState, which renders a styled error/alert UI component with configurable props such as title, message, retry callback, and inline styling.

methods.name: ErrorState({ title = "Something went wrong", message = "Please try again.", onRetry, actionLabel = "Retry", inline = false, children = null, ...rest })
methods.description: React functional component rendering an error/alert UI with customizable props.
